Advertize with style/add colors to your rovers, space stations, bases and spaceship.

v0.9 release - read the included readme carefully.

Despite all the care put in it to make sure everything was clean and smooth, if you encounter any issues directly related to the parts, please let me know.

download links are below.

This is a set of parts made to display a picture on your vehicle and ships.

You can put your own pictures in your spaceship, your brand new space station, your amazing base or anything else. It is even possible to make a kind of ads bombing with a multiple stages and parachutes .

For now, it's just purely cosmetic, but very lightweight, then when money will be added to the game, these ads will generate a passive low regular income. Low just to avoid to earn lot's of money with just this, especially if contract is the heart of the KSP money system.

If a coder has the will and the wish to create the plugin, here are some random idea:

- income generation would be like solar panel energy, but instead of being triggered by facing The Star, it will be facing Kerbin or any another ads target (so ads facing the Mun will make 0 money at all)

- companies' campgains: an ads will generate money only for a limited time, in a decreasing fashion

- campaings "conflict": you can't group ads together in one single ship to make more money if all ads are from competing companies (kind of Coc../Pep.../SodaS... thing)

- bonus for the first time achievement (like in Ribbon mod for kerbals), companies are more happy to pay more to be the first in everything, 1st in orbit, 1st on Mun, and so on, as the 500000th mission to Mun will not get any attention to public at all. These bonus can be a factor to the difficulty of the mission like x 5 for the 1st full stable orbit, x 10 for the 1st Mun landing (including coming back), x12 for Munmin, x15, x18, x20, ...

companies relative "mood" idea:

each company can have 3 different attitude regarding the other: positive, neutral, negative.

(Sadely, a binary set would have been easier and cheaper to make, but I don't think it will be usefull.)

positive = companies can be associated on the same vessel/flight on one single multifaced ads (it may be likely possible to add bonus for such association)

neutral = they don't mind about the other, or being "associated" with the other (they are not on the same market for example)

negative = companies really be angry to be associated, even on the same space-station or base (so be carefull with our modules)

Each of these 3 relative behaviors may be part of bonus-malus system, like +1 = ads from both companies generate +x money each iteration, 0 = no change, -1 = both ads will generate -x money each iteration, or even no money at all.

another plugin can be made to display a set of pictures or even some animation (snjo's FireSpitter tex changer can also be usefull here).

features:

- two flat panels 1x1m and 1x2m

- nine axial mounting shapes: hexagonal, octogonal and cylindrical all in 3 sizes

- lightweight, ads will not compromize your missions

- template included, make your own ads easy

- different textures set to save memory (base, high-res are 1024x1024 compressed targa), I planned to make 512x512 as release tex sets, 1024x1024 as HighRes, and 256x256 as LowRes.

- a dedicated icon for PartCatalog plugin

If you have some idea to share, don't hesitate, I could add more parts.

download: zip archive 7-zip archive

photoshop templates: zip archive 7-zip archive

A version that was curved to cup neatly over the roof on an SP+ cockpit would be awesome.

Firstly: thanks for the mod. Y'all do great work, and the rest of us are your fans, not your customers. You don't owe us anything, and I'm grateful for whatever I get.

However, since you asked for feedback:

From the point of view of a not-stupid but not-interested-in-hours-fighting-with-Adobe person, the level of user friendliness that something like this needs is the ability to just take a single flat logo image (eg: http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/w/images/thumb/f/fa/Kerbodyne.png/180px-Kerbodyne.png), cut and paste that into the mod without alteration, and have it work from there.

The current templates (http://i.imgur.com/rpELz6F.png) are confusing and a bit intimidating: I have no idea what I'm supposed to do with those stripes along the bottom or the square in top right, and figuring it out would take this out of "game" and into "work".

Ideally, there would be a menu to choose from presets, as with the default flags. Add to that the ability to use custom images, preferably just by a "select image file to use" or "enter URL of image file" method. Similar to how you'd post a screenshot to the forums.

It would be nice if the preset options included all the iconic KSP companies, but even just having one or two would be a big improvement. At the moment, if you're not up to messing around with the templates, the choices are placeholder text or nothing.

Would making the billboards double-sided solve the symmetry issues? It doesn't matter if the "wrong" side is facing out if both sides look the same.
